title: Fix tiles not loading on browse page

requirements.text: Debug and fix the issue preventing gift pack tiles from rendering on the catalog/browse page (CatalogPage.tsx). Investigate data fetching, filtering logic, and component rendering to identify why tiles are not displaying.

quotes: tiles are not loading on browse page

acceptanceCriteria: Gift pack tiles render successfully on the browse/catalog page
All gift packs from the backend are displayed in the product grid
Filtering and search functionality work correctly with visible tiles
Loading states display appropriately while data is being fetched
Error states display if data fetching fails

requirements.text: Verify that the useGiftPacks hook is correctly fetching gift pack data from the backend and that the filtered results are being passed to the ProductGrid component on the CatalogPage.
acceptanceCriteria: useGiftPacks hook successfully fetches data from backend
Filtered gift packs array is correctly populated
ProductGrid component receives the filtered gift packs as props
Console logs or debugging confirms data flow through the component tree

requirements.text: Check if the backend main.mo actor is returning gift pack data correctly and that there are gift packs available in the backend storage to display on the browse page.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend getAllGiftPacks method returns gift pack data successfully
Gift pack storage contains entries to display
Backend responds without errors when queried for gift packs
Data structure matches what the frontend expects

constraints: Do not modify the cart functionality that was recently fixed
Maintain existing filter sidebar and search functionality
Preserve the current layout and styling of the catalog page
nonGoals: Adding new features to the catalog page
Redesigning the gift pack card layout
Modifying the backend data structure for gift packs
Changing authentication or cart synchronization logic
